content:
# The smelting process has successfully produced 5 more iron plates in the furnace. 
# My inventory currently contains 5 iron gear wheels and 5 iron ore, along with wood and stone.

# Now, I will extract the 5 iron plates from the furnace to add to my inventory.
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace, quantity=5)  # Extracting the 5 plates

# Let's check my inventory after extracting the iron plates.
print(f"Inventory after extracting iron plates: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Now I have a total of 10 iron plates (5 from before + 5 extracted) and 5 iron gear wheels.
# I can now craft the assembling machine, which requires:
# - 10 iron gear wheels
# - 10 electronic circuits
# - 4 transport belts

# I still need to craft the remaining components for the assembling machine. 
# I will first focus on crafting the remaining iron gear wheels.

# Since I have 10 iron plates, I can now craft 5 more iron gear wheels.
for _ in range(5):  # Attempt to craft 5 more iron gear wheels
    if inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 2:
        craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel)

# Checking inventory after crafting
print(f"Inventory after crafting additional iron gear wheels: {inspect_inventory()}")
